definition[0]: unable to look after yourself or to do anything to help yourself
example[0]: He began to feel depressed and helpless.
example[1]: a vicious attack on a helpless victim
example[2]: Newman threw out a hand in a helpless gesture.
definition[1]: unable to control a strong feeling that you have
example[3]: We both collapsed into helpless giggles.
example[4]: He was near to death, and I was helpless with fear.
